data.name: Plead with the Elder Gods
data.detailed_description:
Reclaim What You Have Lost

Journey to plead with four elder gods to reclaim the life you once had. Most pilgrims appeal to a single god, but what you’re asking for is beyond a single god’s power.


Plead with the Elder Gods is a melancholy 3D metroidvania adventure in a large interconnected fantasy world. Explore windy mountaintops, ancient ritual sites and long forgotten settlements; befriend and clash with other pilgrims; and gain the favor of the gods in order to reach your goal.

Explore a large, interconnected world

  • A dark but beautiful world full of intertwining pathways, unlockable shortcuts, and hidden passages.

Choose your own path

  • The domain of the elder gods is vast, and there is a lot to explore. You choose which path you go down, and which you leave for later.

Receive gifts from the gods

  • Gain divine abilities that allow you to progress through previously unreachable areas. Grow horns that let you see more than the average human. Sprout wings to glide long distances. Transform your sword hand into a hardened spike, and pierce through various obstacles.

Equip occult sigils

  • Find or receive magical symbols which will boost or change your core abilities. Equip a combination that suits your needs.

Unravel the mysteries of the world

  • Meet peculiar characters, examine ancient artifacts, explore secret areas, and piece together the secrets of the gods.

Battle people and beasts who have lost their “heart”

  • Use your divine abilities to survive the perilous pilgrimage, and claim your enemies’ “heart” as your own.

data.short_description: A 3D metroidvania adventure in a large, interconnected dark fantasy world. Discover secrets in snowy canyons, lush forests, murky caves and fallen castles. Gain divine abilities, meet peculiar travellers, fight deadly creatures, and make pilgrimage to meet four elder gods.

movies.name: Plead with the Elder Gods - First Trailer

release_date.date: When the gods will it so
